section_text: 1 In section 13(3) of the  Scottish Development Agency Act 1975 (which sets out the limit on the aggregate of certain amounts outstanding as regards the Scottish Development Agency), for the words “£700 million” (which were substituted by section 2(1) of the  Industry Act 1981) there shall be substituted the words  “          £1,200 million        ” .
2 1 This Act may be cited as the Scottish Development Agency Act 1987. 2 This Act extends to Scotland only.
